name: @ngblaylock/extract-gsheet
description: Quickly get public Google Sheet data as JSON for use on any website.

scripts.build: npm run build:rollup && npm run build:eleventy
scripts.build:eleventy: npm run clean && cross-env ELEVENTY_ENV=prod npx @11ty/eleventy && npm run sass
scripts.dev: npm run dev:eleventy & npm run dev:rollup
scripts.dev:eleventy: npm run clean && npm run sass && npm run sass -- --watch & cross-env ELEVENTY_ENV=dev npx @11ty/eleventy --serve --quiet

author: Nathan Blaylock
